ygData.subject: Re: Loot
ygData.msgSnippet: The cleric is left out from bad groups not good ones. If a BI medallion came up or a PBB I had first call because I was always sat staring at a blank page
ygData.messageBody:
The cleric is left out from bad groups not good ones. If a BI medallion came
up or a PBB I had first call because I was always sat staring at a blank
page whilst the mage got to play with the enemy......

I would make this clear that i got first shout and re spiked collars as a
warrior I never wanted to give up my ringmail/banded/bronze...etc for such a
poor item and I must say as a cleric I preferred my bronze one too the extra
AC is just too much to give away especially as later you cast one heal spell
mid combat in places such as MM and the 500 damage the rest of the party has
dealt out suddenly becomes nothing and bam 3 familiars on me...

Basically get the rules straight when afetr class specific items dont get
walked over and if you dont like it move on is my advice..

Twylork
